channel.title: Need help with easyrsc
channel.description:
please help dont know how to fix this i compile my server fine n everything but when i try to start it it runs and then shuts off thanks
get this here also Buildfile: C:\Users\Sissy\Desktop\Server\build.xml

item.title: Need help with easyrsc
item.dc:creator: @def_pker def pker
item.description:
@def_pker wrote:

solved its my was java i downloaded the new 1.7.0_0.5 and it messed up my whole pc so i reloaded jdk java 6 ud31 and kre 6 ud31 and it works fine now the new java it not good for rsc to let u all know well thanks for looking at this

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with easyrsc
item.dc:creator: @puffer puffer
item.description:
@puffer wrote:

It looks like you have messed up the invitem model file. Have you tried adding new items or edited anything in that xml file?

Read full topic
